en-US.name: Treasure Finders Plus
en-US.summary: 1 new members-only adventure each month + over 10 previously released adventures.
en-US.description: Get access to a new adventure each month for members only, along with a growing collection of over 10 previously released members-only adventures. Includes Crystal Catchers, The Light Stone, The Dark Pool, The Cave Fish, Long Way Down and more.
examplePhrases: Alexa, play with treasure finders plus

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: {PREMIUM_CONTENT_TITLE} includes access to all of our current adventures and a new one each month.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Enjoy {PREMIUM_CONTENT_TITLE}! Ask for a list of adventures to explore your purchase..
